CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 26, 1974, pg. 11 reads: "Jolly Eight Celebrate - For their 48th Anniversary Observance, members of the Jolly Eight Club held a dinner meeting, recently, at the Sherwood East Diningroom. Mrs. Ruth Parker, first row, right, the only remaining Charter Member, was presented with a gift from the club. Others in the picture, first row, reading from left are, Mmes. Josephine Moreland, Mabel Morgan, Alberta Mitchell, president; and Virginia Christian.  Back row, Mrs. Minnie Aldrich, left, and Mrs. Willa M. Thompson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of men, and women, including Jolly Eight Club members, seated: Ruth Parker, left; Willa M .Thompson, second from left; Alberta Mitchell, head of table; and Minnie Aldrich, fifth from right; standing: Mabel Morgan, second from left; Josephine Moreland, center; and Virginia Christian, right; posed in Sherwood East Dining Room for 48th Anniversary, another version
